lead_paragraph: Knicks  center Eddy Curry defaulted on a $570,000 personal loan while keeping up a lifestyle that included a $17,000-a-month home, a $6,000-a-month personal chef and a dozen cars.
snippet: Knicks  center Eddy Curry defaulted on a $570,000 personal loan while keeping up a lifestyle that included a $17,000-a-month home, a $6,000-a-month personal chef and a dozen cars.
